title: How much more advanced would we be now if every single invention took a year less to create? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know if this was an attempt at a trick question but there's no way I can think about it where the answer isn't “exactly one year more advanced”. Now if you had asked “How much more advanced would we be now if every single invention took one year less to create?” that would be a much different answer. I won't go into detail, but all technologies are built on other technologies, sometimes hundreds deep, so the answer would probably be that we would have already reached the singularity by now.
